verses.padam: - Padam sAddhyAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargakAmA̍ iti# suvarga - kAmAḥ|Etam|ṣaḍrAtramiti# ṣaṭ - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|ṣaḍrAtramiti̍# ṣaṭ - rAtram|AsatE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|yanti|dEvasatramiti# dEva - satram|vai|ṣaḍrAtra iti# ṣaṭ - rAtraḥ|pratyakṣamiti# prati - akṣa̱m|hi|EtAni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|ṣaḍrAtramiti̍# ṣaṭ - rAtram|AsatE|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|ṣaḍrAtra̍ iti# ṣaṭ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|ṣaṭ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAddhyA vai dEvAḥ suvargakA̍mA̍ Etaṃ ṣaḍ-rAtrama̍paśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ ṣaḍ-rAtramAsatE̍ suvargamEva lOkaM ~Myanti̍ dEvasatraM ~Mvai ṣaḍ-rAtraḥ̍ pratyakṣaṅq hyEtAni̍# pRuṣṭhAni ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ ṣaḍ-rAtramAsatE̍ sAkṣAdEva dEvatA# aByArOhanti̍ ṣaḍ-rAtrO Bavati̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ ṣaṭ pRuṣṭhAni# - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|RutUn|anvArOhantItya̍nu̍ - ArOhanti|RutuBirityRutu̍ -Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|tE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Bavati|tEjaḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhatE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|rundhatE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: pRuṣṭhairEvartUna-nvArOhantyRutuBi̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM tE saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhanti bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathaMtaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ trivRudagniṣṭOmO̍ Bavati̍ tEja# EvAva# rundhatE pa~jcadaśO BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# rundhatE saptadaśO- [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyantE|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dadhatE|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|Bavati|vijityA̍ iti vi - jityai|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|sadOhavid^^rdhAnina iti# sadaḥ - havid^^rdhAninaḥ|EtEna̍|ṣaḍrAtrEṇEti̍# ṣaṭ - rAtrEṇa|yajErann|Aśva̍tthI̍ iti|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|ca|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni-iddhram|ca|Bavataḥ|tat|hi|suvargya̍miti̍# suvaḥ - gya̱m|cakrIvatI̍ iti|Bavataḥ|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM-aṣṭyai|ulUKalabuddhna̍ ityulUKala̍ - buddhnaḥ|yUpaḥ|Bavati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|prA~jcaḥ|yAnti|prA~g|iva|hi|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: Bava-tyannAdyasyA-va̍ruddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyanta EkaviṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&tman̍ dadhatE̍ triṇavO Bavati̍ vijityai̍ trayastriṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ sadOhavirddhAnina# EtEna# ṣaḍ-rAtrEṇa# yajErannAśvatthI̍ havirddhAnaM cA&&*gnI̱ddhraM ca Bavatastaddhi suvargya̍M̍ cakrIvatI̍ Bavataḥ suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyA̍ ulUKalabuddhnO̍ yUpO# Bavati pratiṣṭhityai̍ prA~jcO# yAnti prA~giva̍ hi suvargO̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam lOkaḥ|sarasvatyA|yAnti|Eṣaḥ|vai|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva-yAnaḥ|panthA̱ḥ|tam|Eva|anvArO̍hantItya̍nu̍ - ArOhanti|AkrOśa̍nta̍ ityA̱ - krOśantaḥ|yAnti|ava̍rtim|Eva|anyasminn̍|pratiṣajyEti̍# prati - sajya|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati-sthAm|gacCanti|yadA|daśa|śatam|kurvanti̍|atha̍|Eka̱m|utthAnamityu̍t-sthAna̱m|śatAyuriti̍# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata-indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|yadA|śatam|sahasra̱m|kurvanti̍|atha̍|Eka̱m|utthAnamityu̍t-̍ sthAna̱m|sahasrasaMmita̍ iti# sahasra-sammitaḥ|vai|asau|lOkaḥ|amum|Eva|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayanti|yadA̍ ( )|EṣAm|pramIyEtEti# pra - mIyEta|yadA|vA|jIyE̍rann|atha̍|Eka̱m|utthAnamityu̍t̍ - sthAna̱m|tat|hi|tIrtham||4 (61)
verses.samhita: lOkaḥ sarasvatyA̍ yAntyEṣa vai dEvayAnaḥ̍ panthAsta-mEvA-nvArOhantyAkrOśa̍ntO̍ yAntyavarti-mEvAnyasmi̍n̍ pratiṣajya# pratiṣṭhAM gacCanti̍ yadA daśa# śataM kurvantyathaika-mutthAnaṃ̍# śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti yadA śataṃ sahasraM̍ kurvantyathaika-mutthAnaṃ̍# sahasrasaMmitO̍ vA asau lOkO&mumEva̍ lOkamaBi jayanti̍ yadai ( ) -ṣA̱M pramIyEta̍ yadA vA jIyErannathaika̍-mutthAnaM̍ taddhi tIrthaM||4

verses.padam: - Padam kusurubindaḥ|auddA̍lakirityaut̍ - dAlakiḥ|akAmayata|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|saptarAtramiti̍# sapta-rAtram|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tEna̍|vai|saḥ|yAva̍ntaḥ|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|avEti̍|arundha|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|saptarAtrEṇEti̍# sapta - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|yAva̍ntaḥ|Eva|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|saptarAtra̍ iti# sapta-rAtraḥ|Bavati|sapta|grAmyAḥ|paśavaḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|sapta|CandAṃ̍si|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni-stOmaḥ|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kusurubinda auddAlakirakAmayata̍ paśumAnth syAmiti sa Etaṃ saptarAtramA&ha̍rat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tEna vai sa yAvantO̍ grAmyAḥ paśavastAnavA-rundha̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnth saptarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ yAvanta̍ Eva grAmyAḥ paśavastAnEvAva# rundhE saptarAtrO Bavati̍ sapta grAmyAḥ paśavaḥ̍ saptA&&*raṇyAḥ sapta CandAṅ-syuBayasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ trivRudagniṣṭOmO̍ Bavati̍ tEja# - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|avEti|rundhE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|athO̍ iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyatE|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|triṇava̍ iti# tri-navaḥ|Bavati|vijityA̍ iti vi - jityai|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Bavati|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|Aptyai̱|mahAvratavAniti# mahAvrata-vAn|annAdyasyEtyanna-adya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|sarvapRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sarvasya|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|yat|pratyakṣamiti# prati - akṣa̱m|pUrvEṣu|ahassvityaha̍ḥ̍ - su|pRuṣṭhAni|upEyurityu̍pa̍ - iyuḥ|pratyakṣamiti# prati - akṣa̱m|6 (50)
verses.samhita: EvAva# rundhE pa~jcadaśO BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# rundhE saptadaśO BavatyannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyata EkaviṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dhattE̍ triṇavO Bavati̍ vijityai̍ pa~jcaviṃqśO̱-&gniṣṭOmO Bavati̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# mahAvratavA-nannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyai̍ viśvajith sarvapRuṣṭhO̍ &tirAtrO Bavati̍ sarvasyABiji̍tyai̍ yat pratyakṣaM pUrvEṣvahassu̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupEyuḥ̍ pratyakṣaM̍ -[ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam viśvajitIti# viśva - jiti|yathA̱|dugdhAm|upasIdatItyu̍pa-̍ sIdati|Evam|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|ahaḥ|syAt|na|EkarAtra̍ ityEka̍ - rAtraḥ|cana|syAt|bRuhadrathantarE iti# bRuhat-rathantarE|pUrvEṣu|ahassvityaha̍ḥ̍ - su|upEti|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|na|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|yat|pratyakṣamiti̍# prati - akṣa̱m|viśvajitIti# viśva - jiti|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|yathA̱|prattA̱m|duhE|tAdRuk|Eva|tat||7̍ (42) (tEja# - upEyuḥ pratyakṣaM - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: ~Mviśvajiti yathA# dugdhA-mupasIda̍tyEvamu̍ttama-maha̍ḥ̍ syAnnaikarAtraścana̍ syA̱d bRuhad-rathantarE pUrvEṣvahassUpa# yantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva na yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti yat pratyakṣaM̍ ~Mviśvajiti# pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍ yathA prattA̱M duhE tAdRugEva tat||7 (tEja# - upEyuḥ pratyakṣaM - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|akAmayata|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|aṣṭarAtramitya̍ṣṭa-rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma-varcasI|aBavat|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|aṣṭarAtrEṇEtyaṣṭa̍ - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|aṣṭarAtra ityaṣṭa̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|gAyatriyA|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|aṣṭarAtra̍ ityaṣṭa-rAtraḥ|Bavati|cata̍sraḥ|vai|diśa̍ḥ|cata̍sraḥ|avAntaradiśA̍ ityavAntara-diśAḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatirakAmayata̍ brahmavarcasI syAmiti sa Eta-maṣṭarAtra-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa brahmavarcasya̍Bavadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnaṣṭarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ BavatyaṣṭarAtrO̍ BavatyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ gAyatriyaiva̍ brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhE&ṣṭarAtrO Bavati̍ catasrO̍ vai diśaścatasrO̍ &vAntaradiśA digBya Eva brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhE- [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam trivRuditi# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni-stOmaḥ|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyatE|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|triṇava̍ iti# tri-navaḥ|Bavati|vijityA̍ iti vi - jityai|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Bavati|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|Aptyai̱|mahAvratavAniti# mahAvrata-vAn|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|sarvapRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sarvasya|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai ( )||9 (50)
verses.samhita: trivRudagniṣṭOmO̍ Bavati̍ tEja# EvAva# rundhE pa~jcadaśO BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# rundhE saptadaśO BavatyannAdyasyA-va̍ruddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyata EkaviṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dhattE̍ triṇavO Bavati̍ vijityai̍ trayastriṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ pa~jcaviṃqśO̱&gniṣṭOmO Bavati̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# mahAvratavAnannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyai̍ viśvajith sarvapRuṣṭhO&tirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ sarvasyABiji̍tyai̍ ( )||9

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|sRuṣṭAḥ|kṣudha̱m|nIti|Ayann|saḥ|Etam|navarAtramiti̍# nava - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|akalpata|yaṛhi̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|kṣudha̱m|nigacCEyuriti̍# ni - gacCEyuḥ|taṛhi̍|navarAtrEṇEti̍# nava - rAtrEṇa|yajEta|imE|hi|vai|EtAsA̱m|lOkAḥ|aklRu̍ptAḥ|atha̍|EtAḥ|kṣudha̱m|nIti̍|gacCanti|imAn|Eva|AByaḥ|lOkAn|kalpayati|tAn|kalpa̍mAnAn|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|anviti̍|kalpatE|kalpa̍ntE|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tAḥ sRuṣṭAḥ kṣudhaM nyAyanthsa̍ EtaM navarAtrapa̍śyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai prajAByO&kalpata̍ yaṛhi# prajAḥ kṣudhaM̍ nigacCEyustaṛhi̍# navarAtrEṇa# yajEtEmE hi vA EtAsA̱M ~MlOkA aklRuptA̍ athaitAḥ kṣudhaM ni gacCantImAnEvA&&*ByO̍# lOkAn kalpayati̍ tAn kalpamAnAn̍ prajAByO&nu# kalpatE kalpantE̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam asmai|imE|lOkAḥ|Urja̱m|prajAsviti# pra - jAsu|dadhAti|trirAtrEṇEti̍# tri - rAtrEṇa|Eva|imam|lOkam|kalpayati|trirAtrEṇEti̍# tri - rAtrEṇa|antari̍kṣam|trirAtrEṇEti̍# tri - rAtrEṇa|amum|lOkam|yathA̱|guṇE|guṇam|anvasyatItya̍nu-asya̍ti|Evam|Eva|tat|lOkE|lOkam|anviti̍|asyati|dhRutyai̱|aśi̍thilaMBAvAyEtyaśi̍thilaM̍ - BAvAya|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|jñAtAḥ|stOmA̱ḥ|Bavanti|iyam|vAva|jyOti̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|jñAtra̱m|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|11 (50)
verses.samhita: &smA imE lOkA UrjaM̍ prajAsu# dadhAti trirAtrEṇaivEmaM ~MlOkaM kalpayati̍ trirAtrEṇAntarikṣaM̍ trirAtrEṇAmuM ~MlOkaM ~MyathA# guṇE gaṇamanvasyatyEvamEva̍ tallOkE lOkamanvasyati̍ dhRutyA aśithilaMBAvAya̍ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# jñAtAḥ stOmA# BavantIyaM ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurEṣvE̍va̍ lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti jñAtraM̍ prajAnA̱M-[ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam gacCati|navarAtra iti# nava - rAtraḥ|Bavati|aBipUrvamityaBi-pUrvam|Eva|asminn|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti|yaḥ|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|syAt|saḥ|navarAtrEṇEti# nava - rAtrEṇa|yajEta|prAṇA̍ iti# pra-anAḥ|hi|vai|Etasya|adhRu̍tAḥ|atha̍|Etasya̍|jyOk|Amayati|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|asminn|dAdhAra|uta|yadi|itAsuritIta̍ - asuḥ|Bavati|jIva̍ti|Eva||12̍ (33) (kalpantE-prajanAM̍ - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: gacCati navarAtrO BavatyaBipUrvamEvA&smin̍ tEjO# dadhAti yO jyOgAmayAvI̍ syAth sa navarAtrEṇa̍# yajEta prAṇA hi vA EtasyA dhRutA̍ athaitasya jyOgAmayati̍ prAṇAnEvAsmin̍ dAdhArOta yadItAsurBavati̍ jIvatyEva||12̍ (kalpantE-prajanAM̍ - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|prEti|jAyEya|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|daśa̍hOtAramiti̍ daśa# - hOtAram|apaśyat|tam|ajuhOt|tEna|daśarAtramiti̍# daśa - rAtram|asRujata|tEna|daśarAtrEṇEti̍# daśa - rAtrEṇa|prEti̍|ajAyata|daśarAtrAyEti̍# daśa-rAtrAya|dIkṣiṣyamA̍ṇaḥ|daśa̍hOtAramiti̍ daśa# - hOtAram|juhuyAt|daśahOtrEti̍ daśa-hOtrA|Eva|daśarAtramiti̍# daśa-rAtram|sRujatE|tEna|daśarAtrEṇEti̍# daśa-rAtrEṇa|prEti̍|jAyatE|vairAjaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|daśarAtra̍ iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|Eva|gacCati|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|13 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirakAmayata̍ pra jAyEyEti̍ sa EtaM daśahOtAramapaśyat̍ tamajuhOt̍ tEna# daśarAtramasRujata̍ tEna# daśarAtrEṇa prA jAyata̍ daśarAtrAya# dIkṣiṣyamAṇO̍ daśahOtAraM̍ juhuyAd-daśahOtraiva̍ daśarAtraṃ̍ sRujatE̍ tEna# daśarAtrEṇa pra jAyatE̍ vairAjO vA Eṣa yajñO yaddaśarAtrO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn-daśarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ virAjamEva̍ gacCati̍ prAjApatyO vA Eṣa yajñO yad-daśarAtrO-[̍ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|indra̍ḥ|vai|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|dEvatABiḥ|AsIt|saḥ|na|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|daśarAtramiti̍# daśa-rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|anyABi̍ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|Eva|pApmanA̱|BrAtRuvyEṇa|gacCati|trikakuditi̍# tri - kakut|vai|14 (50)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvidvAn-daśarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ praiva jAyata̍ indrO vai sadRu~g dEvatABirAsIth̍ sa na vyAvRutamagacCath̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtaM daśarAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO̱&nyABi-rdEvatA̍Bi-rvyAvRuta̍magacCadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAn daśarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ vyAvRutamEva̍ pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇa̍ gacCati trikakudvA - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|kakut|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|kakut|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|kakut|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|trikakuditi̍# tri - kakut|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|Bavati|yajamAnaḥ|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca -daśaḥ|yajamAnaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|yajamAnaḥ|trayastriṃqśa̍ iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|puraḥ|ita̍rAḥ|aBicaryamA̍ṇa̍ ityaBi̍ - caryamAṇaḥ|daśarAtrEṇEti̍# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yajEta|dEvapurA̍ iti# dEva-purAḥ|Eva|parIti|UhatE|tasya̍|na|kuta̍ḥ|cana|upAvyAdha̍ ityupa̍ - AvyAdhaḥ|Bavati|na|Enam|aBicarannityaBi̍ - carann|stRuṇutE|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva-asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAḥ|15 (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa yajñO yad-daśarAtraḥ̍ kakut pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ kakudEkaviṃqśaḥ̍ kakut trayastriṃqśO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daśarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ trikakudEva samAnAnA̱M̍ Bavati yajamAnaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśO yajamAna̍ EkaviṃqśO yajamAnastrayastriṃqśaḥ̍ pura itarA̍ aBicaryamAṇO̍ daśarAtrEṇa# yajEta dEvapurA Eva paryUhatE̍ tasya na kutaścanOpA̱vyAdhO̍ Bavati̍ nainamaBicaraṉth̍ stRuṇutE dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA EtA - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam dEvapurA iti# dEva-purAḥ|apaśyann|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa-rAtraḥ|tAḥ|parIti|auhanta|tEṣA̱m|na|kuta̍ḥ|cana|upAvyAdha̍ ityupa̍ - AvyAdhaḥ|aBavat|tataḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|yajEta|dEvapurA̍ iti# dEva - purAḥ|Eva|parIti|UhatE|tasya̍|na|kuta̍ḥ|cana|upAvyAdha̍ ityupa-̍ AvyAdhaḥ|Bavati|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|stOma̍ḥ|stOma̍sya|upa̍stiḥ|Bavati|BrAtRu̍vyam|Eva|upa̍stim|kurutE|jAmi|vai|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvapurA̍ apaśyanq̍ yad-daśarAtrastAḥ̍ paryauhanta̍ tEṣAM na kutaścanOpA̱vyAdhO̍# &Bavat tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAnth̍ syAth sa daśarAtrEṇa̍# yajEta dEvapurA Eva paryUhatE̍ tasya na kutaścanOpA̱vyAdhO̍ Bavati̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati stOmaḥ stOmasyOpastirBavati̍ BrAtRuvyamEvOpa̍stiM̍ kurutE jAmi vA - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam Etat|kurvanti|yat|jyAyAṃsam|stOma̱m|upEtyEtyu̍pa-itya̍|kanI̍yAṃsam|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|yat|agniṣṭOmasAmAnItya̍gniṣṭOma-sAmAni̍|avastA̱t|ca|parastA̱t|ca|Bava̍nti|ajA̍mitvAyEtyajA̍mi̍ - tvAya|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|agniṣṭudityagni-stut|AgnEyIṣu̍|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca-daśaḥ|ukthyaḥ|aindrIṣu̍|indriyam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|trivaditi̍# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|vaiśvadEvIṣviti# vaiśva - dEvIṣu|puṣṭi̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|prAjApatyAsviti# prAjA - patyAsu|tIvrasOma̍ iti# tIvra-sOmaḥ|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-rudqdhyai|athO̍ iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyatE|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Etat kurvanti̍ yajjyAyAṃsaṅq̍ stOmamupEtya̍ kanIyAṃsamupayanti̍ yadagniṣṭO-masAmAnyavastA̱cca̍ parastA̱cca BavantyajAmitvAya̍ trivRudagniṣṭOmO̱̍ &gniṣṭudA̱gnEyIṣu# Bavati tEja# EvAva# rundhE pa~jcadaśa ukthya# aindrIṣvindriyamEvAva̍# rundhE trivRudagniṣṭOmO̍ vai̱śvadEvIṣu puṣṭimEvAva̍# rundhE saptadaśO̱&gniṣṭOmaḥ prAjApatyAsu̍# tIvrasOmO̱ &nnAdyasyA-varuddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyata - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|ukthyaḥ|saurIṣu̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|prAjApatyAsviti# prAjA - patyAsu|upahavya̍# ityupa̍ - havyaḥ|upahavamityu̍pa̍ - havam|Eva|gacCati|triṇavAviti# tri - navau|agniṣṭOmAvityagni̍ - stOmau|aBitaḥ|aindrIṣu̍|viji̍tyA̍ iti vi - jityai|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|ukthyaḥ|vaiśvadEvIṣviti̍# vaiśva - dEvIṣu|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|sarvapRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sarvasya|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai||18 (31) (prajApatyO vA Eṣa yajñO yad daśarAtra̍ - strikakuddhA̍ - EtA - vai - jAyata̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: Ekaviṃqśa ukthyaḥ̍ saurIṣu pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dhattE̍ saptadaśO̱&gniṣṭOmaḥ prAjApatyAsU̍pahavya̍# upahavamEva gacCati̍ triṇavAvagniṣṭOmAvaBita̍# aindrIṣu vijityai̍ trayastriṃqśa ukthyO# vaiśvadEvIṣu pratiṣṭhityai̍ viśvajith sarvapRuṣṭhO&tirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ sarvasyABiji̍tyai||18̍ (prajApatyO vA Eṣa yajñO yad daśarAtra̍ - strikakuddhA̍ - EtA - vai - jAyata̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Rutavaḥ|vai|prajAkA̍mA̍ iti# prajA - kAmAḥ|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|na|avindanta|tE|akAmayanta|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|sRujEmahi|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|avEti|rundhImahi|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|vindEmahi|prajAvanta̍ iti# prajA - vantaḥ|syAma|iti|tE|Etam|EkAdaśarAtramityE̍kAdaśa̍ - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|asRujanta|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|avEti|arundhata|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|avindanta|prajAvanta̍ iti# prajA - vantaḥ|aBavann|tE|Rutavaḥ|aBavann|tat|ArtavAnA̱m|ArtavatvamityA̱rtava̍ - tvam|RutUnAm|vai|EtE|putrAḥ|tasmA̱t|19 (50)
verses.samhita: RutavO vai prajAkAmAḥ̍ prajAM nA&vindanta̍ tE&kAmayanta̍ prajAṃ sRujEmahi̍ prajAmava# rundhImahi prajAM ~MvindEmahi̍ prajAvantaḥ̍ syAmEti ta EtamEkAdaśarAtrama̍paśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai tE prajAmasRujanta̍ prajAmavArundhata̍ prajAmavindanta̍ prajAvantO&Bavanta̍ RutavO&Bavan̍ tadA̱rtavAnA-mArtavatva-mRu̍tUnAM̍ ~MvA EtE putrAstasmA# - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam ArtavAḥ|ucyantE|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EkAdaśarAtramityE̍kAdaśa̍ - rAtram|AsatE|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|sRujantE|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|avEti|rundhatE|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|vindantE|prajAvanta̍ iti# prajA - vantaḥ|Bavanti|jyOtiḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|jyOtiḥ|Eva|purastA̱t|dadhatE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|pRuṣṭhyaḥ|ṣaḍaha̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahaḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|ṣaṭ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|RutUn|anvArO̍hantItya̍nu̍ - ArOhanti|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|tE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ-viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|caturviṃśatyakṣarEti̍ catuviṃśati̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|20 (50)
verses.samhita: -dArtavA ucyantE̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EkAdaśarAtramAsatE̍ prajAmEva sRujantE̍ prajAmava# rundhatE prajAM ~MvindantE̍ prajAvantO̍ Bavanti jyOtiratirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ jyOtirEva̍ purastA̱d-dadhatE suvargasya# lOkasyA-nuKyAtyai̍ pRuṣṭhyaḥ̍ ṣaḍahO Bavati̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ ṣaṭ pRuṣṭhAni# pRuṣṭhairEvartUna-nvArOhantyRutuBi̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM tE saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhanti caturviṃqśO Bavati̍ caturviṃśatyakṣarA̍ gAyatrI - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatram|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|gAyatriyAm|Eva|brahmavarcasa iti# brahma - varcasE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|catuścatvAriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|Bavati|catuścatvAriṃśadakṣarEti̍ catuścatvAriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭuk|indriyam|triṣṭup|triṣṭuBi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|aṣṭAcatvAriṃqśa̍ ityaṣṭA̍ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAcatvAriṃśadakṣarEtyaṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|jagatI|jAga̍tAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|jaga̍tyAm|Eva|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EkAdaśarAtra̍ ityEkAdaśa-rAtraḥ|Bavati|pa~jca̍|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|ArtavAḥ|pa~jca̍|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|ArtavEṣu̍|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratiṣṭhAyEti# prati - sthAya|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|avEti|rundhatE|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|parigRuhItyA̍ iti pari-gRuhItyai||21̍ (49)
verses.samhita: gAyatraM̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ gAyatriyAmEva̍ brahmavarcasE̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti catuścatvAriṃqśO Bavati̍ catuṣcatvAriṃśadakṣarA̍ triṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭup triṣṭuByEvEndriyE prati# tiṣṭhantyaṣṭAcatvAriṃqśO BavatyaṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśadakṣarA̍ jagatI̍ jAgatAḥ̍ paśavO jagatyAmEva̍ paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhantyE-kAdaśarAtrO Bavati̍ pa~jca vA Rutava# ArtavAḥ pa~jcartuṣvEvA&&*rtavEṣu# saM~MvathsarE pratiṣṭhAya̍# prajAmava# rundhatE &tirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ prajAyai parigRuhItyai||21̍

verses.padam: - Padam aindravAyavAgrAnityai̱ndravAyava - agrAn|gRuhṇIyAt|yaḥ|kAmayEta|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|kalpErann|iti|yajñasya̍|vai|klRupti̱m|anviti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|kalpantE|yajñasya|aklRu̍ptim|anviti̍|na|kalpantE|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|Eva|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|kalpayati|na|jyAyAṃsam|kanI̍yAn|atIti̍|krAmati|aindravAyavAgrAnityai̱ndravAyava̍ - agrAn|gRuhṇIyAt|AmayAvinaḥ|prAṇEnEti̍# pra - anEna|vai|Eṣaḥ|vIti̍|RuddhyatE|yasya̍|Amaya̍ti|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|prAṇEnEti# pra - anEna|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|maitrAvaruṇAgrAniti̍# maitrAvaruṇa - agrAn|gRuhṇIrann|yEṣA̱m|dIkṣitAnA̱m|pramIyEtEti# pra - mIyEta|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aindravAyavAgrA̱n gRuhṇIyAdyaḥ kAmayEta̍ yathA pUrvaM prajAḥ kalpEranniti̍# yajñasya vai klRuptimanu# prajAḥ kalpantE̍ yajñasyA-klRuptimanu̍ na kalpantE̍ yathA pUrvamEva prajAḥ kalpayati̍ na jyAyAṃsaM̍ kanIyAnati̍# krAmatyaindravAyavAgrA̱n gRuhṇIyAdAmayAvinaḥ̍ prAṇEna vA Eṣa vyRuddhyatE̍ yasyA&&*mayati̍ prAṇa ai̱ndravAyavaḥ prAṇEnaivainaṃq samarddhayati̍ maitrAvaruṇAgrA̱n gRuhṇIranq yEṣA̱M dIkṣitAnA̱M pramIyEta-[̍ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇApAnAByAmiti# prAṇa - apAnAByA̱m|vai|EtE|vIti|RuddhyantE|yEṣA̱m|dIkṣitAnA̱m|pramIya̍ta̍ iti# pra - mIyatE|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|muKataḥ|parIti|harantE|AśvinAgrAnityA̱śvina-agrAn|gRuhṇIta|AnujAvara̍ ityAnu-jAvaraḥ|aśvinau̱|vai|dEvAnA̱m|AnujAvarAvityA̍nu̍ - jAvarau|paścA|iva|agra̱m|parIti|aitAm|aśvinau̱|Etasya̍|dEvatA̱|yaḥ|AnujAvara̍ ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|tau|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|parIti|nayataḥ|śukrAgrAniti̍# śukra - agrAn|gRuhṇIta|gataśrIriti# gata - śrIḥ|pratiṣṭhAkAma̍ iti# pratiṣṭhA - kAmaḥ|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|śukraḥ|Eṣaḥ|antaḥ|anta̱m|manuṣya̍ḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇApAnAByAM ~MvA EtE vyRuddhyantE̍ yEṣA̱M dIkṣitAnA̱M pramIyatE̍ prAṇApAnau mitrAvaruṇau̍ prAṇApAnAvEva muKataḥ̍ pari# haranta AśvinAgrA̱n gRuhṇItA &&*nujAvarO̱&śvinau vai dEvAnAmAnujAvarau̍ paścEvAgraM paryaitA-maśvinA̍vEtasya̍# dEvatA ya AnujAvara-stAvEvainamagraM̍ pari# ṇayataḥ śukrAgrA̱n gRuhṇIta gataśrI̱ḥ pratiṣṭhAkAmO&sau̍ vA Adityaḥ̍ śukra EṣO&ntO&ntaM# manuṣyaḥ̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam śriyai|gatvA|nIti|vartatE|antA̱t|Eva|anta̱m|Eti̍|raBatE|na|tata̍ḥ|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|manthya̍grAniti̍# manthi-agrAn|gRuhṇIta|aBicarannityaBi̍ - carann|ArtapAtramityA̱rta̍ - pAtram|vai|Etat|yat|manthipAtramiti# manthi - pAtram|mRutyunA̱|Eva|Enam|grAhayati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|AgrayaṇAgrAnityA̱grayaṇa-agrAn|gRuhṇIta|yasya̍|pitA|pitAmahaḥ|puṇya̍ḥ|syAt|atha̍|tat|na|prApnuyAditi̍# pra - ApnuyAt|vAcA|vai|Eṣaḥ|indriyEṇa|vIti̍|RuddhyatE|yasya̍|pitA|pitAmahaḥ|puṇya̍ḥ|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śriyai gatvA ni vartatE̍ &ntAdEvA&ntamA̍ raBatE̍ na tataḥ pApIyAn̍ Bavati manthyagrAn̍ gRuhṇItA-Bicara-nnArtapAtraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yan-manthipAtraM̍ mRutyunaivainaM̍ grAhayati tAjagArtimArcCatyA-grayaṇAgrA̱n̍ gRuhṇIta yasya# pitA pitAmahaḥ̍ puṇyaḥ syAdatha tanna prA̱pnuyAd-vAcA vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍ vyRuddhyatE̍ yasya# pitA pitAmahaḥ̍ puṇyO - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|atha̍|tat|na|prApnOtIti̍# pra - ApnOti|ura̍ḥ|iva|Etat|yajñasya̍|vAk|iva|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|vAcA|Eva|Enam|indriyEṇa̍|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|na|tata̍ḥ|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|ukthyA̱grAnityukthya̍# - agrAn|gRuhṇIta|aBicaryamAṇa̍ ityaBi̍ - caryamAṇaḥ|sarvE̍ṣAm|vai|Etat|pAtrA̍ṇAm|indriyam|yat|ukthyapAtramityu̍kthya̍ - pAtram|sarvEṇa|Eva|Enam|indriyEṇa̍|ati̍|prEti̍|yu~gktE|sara̍svati|aBIti̍|naḥ|nEṣi|vasya̍ḥ|iti̍|purOrucamiti̍# puraḥ - ruca̱m|kuryAt|vAk|vai|25 (50)
verses.samhita: Bavatyatha tanna prApnOtyura# ivaitad-yajñasya vAgiva̍ yadA̱grayaṇO vAcaivainamindriyEṇa̍ samarddhayati̍ na tataḥ pApIyAn̍ BavatyukthyA̱grAn gRuhṇItABicaryamAṇaḥ̍ sarvEṣAM̍ ~MvA Etat pAtrAṇAmindriyaM̍ ~MyadukthyapAtraṃ̍ sarvEṇaivaina̍mindriyEṇAti̍ prayu~gktE̍ sarasvatyaBi̍ nO# nEṣi vasya iti# purOrucaM̍ kuryAd-vAgvai - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam sarasvatI|vAcA|Eva|Enam|ati̍|prEti̍|yu~gktE|mA|tvat|kṣEtrA̍ṇi|ara̍ṇAni|ganma|iti̍|Aha|mRutyOḥ|vai|kṣEtrA̍ṇi|ara̍ṇAni|tEna̍|Eva|mRutyOḥ|kṣEtrA̍ṇi|na|gacCati|pUrṇAn|grahAn̍|gRuhṇIyAt|AmayAvina̍ḥ|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|vai|Etasya|śuk|RucCati|yasya̍|Amaya̍ti|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|prAṇAniti# pra-anAn|Eva|asya|śucaḥ|mu~jcati|uta|yadi|itAsuritIta̍ - asuḥ|Bavati|jIva̍ti|Eva|pUrṇAn|grahAn̍# ( )|gRuhṇIyAt|yaṛhi|parjanya̍ḥ|na|vaṛṣa̱t|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|vai|Etaṛhi|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|śuk|RucCati|yaṛhi|parjanya̍ḥ|na|vaṛṣa̍ti|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|śucaḥ|mu~jcati|tAjak|prEti|vaṛṣati||26̍ (75) (pramIyEta̍ - manuṣya# - RuddhyatE yasya# pitA pitAmahaḥ̍ puṇyO-vAgvA-Eva pUrṇAn grahAn-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: sarasvatI̍ vAcaivainamati prayu~gktE̍ mA tvat kṣEtrAṇyaraṇAni̍ ganmEtyAha̍ mRutyOrvai kṣEtrAṇyaraṇAni̍ tEnaiva mRutyOḥ kṣEtrAṇi̍ na gacCati̍ pUrṇAn grahA̱n gRuhṇIyAdAmayAvinaḥ̍ prAṇAn vA Etasya śugRucCati̍ yasyA &&*mayati̍ prAṇA grahA̱ḥ prAṇAnEvAsya# śucO mu~jcatyuta̍ yadItAsurBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ pUrṇAn grahA̱n ( ) gRuhṇIyAd-yaṛhi# parjanyO na vaṛṣE̱t prAṇAn vA Etaṛhi# prajAnAṃq śugRucCati̍ yaṛhi# parjanyO na vaṛṣati̍ prAṇA grahA̱ḥ prAṇAnEva prajAnAṃ# śucO mu~jcati̍ tAjak pra vaṛṣati||26̍ (pramIyEta̍ - manuṣya# - RuddhyatE yasya# pitA pitAmahaḥ̍ puṇyO-vAgvA-Eva pUrṇAn grahAn-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatraḥ|vai|aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gAyatram|prAyaṇIyamiti# pra - ayanIya̱m|ahaḥ|tasmA̱t|prAyaṇIya̍ iti# pra - ayanIyE̱|ahann|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|traiṣṭu̍Baḥ|vai|śukraḥ|traiṣṭu̍Bam|dvitIya̱m|aha̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|dvitIyE̱|ahann̍|śukraḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|jAga̍taḥ|vai|Agrayaṇaḥ|jAga̍tam|tRutIya̱m|aha̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|tRutIyE̱|ahann̍|Agrayaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|Etat|vai|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gAyatrO vA ai̱ndravAyavO gAyatraM̍ prAyaṇIya-mahastasmA̱t̍ prAyaṇIyE-&hannaindravAyavO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAti traiṣṭuBO̍ vai śukrastraiṣṭuBaM̍ dvitIya-mahastasmA̱d dvitIyE&ha~jCukrO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAti jAgatO̍ vA A̱grayaṇO jAgataM̍ tRutIya-mahastasmA̱t tRutIyE&hannAgrayaṇO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAtyEtadvai - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam|Apat|yat|CandAṃsi|ApnOti̍|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|śvaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|yatra̍|Eva|yajñam|adRu̍śann|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|prEti̍|yu~gktE|jaga̍nmuKa̍ iti jagat̍ - muKaḥ|vai|dvitIyaḥ|trirAtra̍ iti# tri - rAtraḥ|jAgataḥ|Agrayaṇaḥ|yat|caturthE|ahann̍|Agrayaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|athO̍ iti|svam|Eva|Canda̍ḥ|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari-AvartantE|rAtha̍ntara̍ iti rAtha̱M-taraḥ|vai|aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|rAthantaramiti̍ rAtha̱M - taram|pa~jcamam|ahaḥ|tasmA̱t|pa~jcamE|ahann̍|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñamApad-yacCandAṅ̍syApnOti̍ yadA̱grayaṇaḥ śvO gRuhyatE yatraiva yajñamadRuśan̍ tata# EvainaM punaḥ prayu~gktE̍ jaganmuKO̍ vai dvitIyastrirAtrO̍ jAgata̍ AgrayaṇO yaccaturthE&ha̍nnAgrayaṇO̍ gRuhyatE sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAtyathO svamEva CandO&nu# paryAvartantE̍ rAthantarO̍ vA ai̱ndravAyavO rAthantaraM̍ pa~jcamamahastasmA̱t pa~jcamE&ha# - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|bAṛha̍taḥ|vai|śukraḥ|bAṛha̍tam|ṣaṣṭham|aha̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|ṣaṣṭhE|ahann̍|śukraḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|Etat|vai|dvitIya̱m|yajñam|Apat|yat|CandAṃ̍si|ApnOti̍|yat|śukraḥ|śvaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|yatra̍|Eva|yajñam|adRu̍śann|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|prEti̍|yu~gktE|triṣṭu~gmu̍Ka̍ iti# triṣṭuk - muKaḥ|vai|tRutIyaḥ|trirAtra̍ iti# tri - rAtraḥ|traiṣṭuBaḥ|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nnaindravAyavO gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAti bAṛhatO̍ vai śukrO bAṛhataṃ̍ ṣaṣṭhamahastasmA̱th ṣaṣṭhE&ha~jCukrO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAtyEtadvai dvitIyaM̍ ~MyajñamApad-yacCandAṅ̍syApnOti̍ yacCukraḥ śvO gRuhyatE yatraiva yajñamadRuśan̍ tata# EvainaM punaḥ prayu~gktE̍ triṣṭu~gmuKO̍ vai tRutIyastrirAtrastraiṣṭu̍Baḥ̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam śukraḥ|yat|saptamE|ahann|śukraḥ|gRuhyatE̱|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|athO̍ iti|svam|Eva|Canda̍ḥ|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|vAk|vai|Agrayaṇaḥ|vAk|aṣṭamam|aha̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|aṣṭamE|ahann̍|Agrayaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|navamam|ahaḥ|tasmA̱t|navamE|ahann̍|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|svE|Eva|Enam|Ayatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|gRuhṇAti|Etat|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śukrO yath saptamE&ha̍~jCukrO̍ gRuhyatE sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAtyathO svamEva CandO&nu# paryAvartantE̍ vAgvA A̱grayaṇO vAgaṣṭamamaha-stasmA̍daṣṭamE&ha̍nnAgrayaṇO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAti prAṇO vA ai̱ndravAyavaḥ prAṇO navama-mahastasmA̱nnavamE̍ &hannaindravAyavO̍ gRuhyatE̍ sva EvainamAyata̍nE̍ gRuhṇAtyEta - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam vai|tRutIya̱m|yajñam|Apat|yat|CandAṃsi|ApnOti̍|yat|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|śvaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|yatra|Eva|yajñam|adRu̍śann|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|prEti̍|yu~gktE|athO̍ iti|svam|Eva|Canda̍ḥ|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|pathaḥ|vai|EtE|adhIti̍|apa̍thEna|yanti|yE|anyEna̍|aindravAyavAdityai̱ndra̍ - vAyavAt|pratipadyanta̍ iti# prati - padyantE|anta̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|yat|daśamam|aha̍ḥ|daśamE|ahann̍|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|yajñasya|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dvai tRutIyaM̍ ~MyajñamApad-yacCandAṅ̍syApnOti̍ yadai̱ndravAyavaḥ śvO gRuhyatE yatraiva yajñamadRuśan̍ tata# EvainaM punaḥ prayu~gktE &thO svamEva CandO&nu# paryAvartantE̍ pathO vA EtE&ddhyapathEna̍ yanti yE̱&nyEnai̱ndravAyavAt pratipadyantE&ntaḥ̍ Kalu vA Eṣa yajñasya yad-daśama-maha̍rdaśamE̍ &hannaindravAyavO̍ gRuhyatE̍ yajñasyai-[ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|anta̱m|gatvA|apathAt|panthA̱m|apIti̍|yanti|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|vahI̍yasA|pratisAramiti̍# prati-sAra̱m|vahanti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|CandAṃ̍si|anyaḥ|anyasya̍|lOkam|aBIti̍|addhyAyann|tAni̍|EtEna̍|Eva|dEvAḥ|vIti̍|avAhayann|aindravAyavasyEtyai̱ndra̍ - vAyavasya|vai|Etat|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|yat|caturtham|aha̍ḥ|tasminn̍|Agrayaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|Agrayaṇasya̍|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱-yatanE|navamE|ahann̍|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|śukrasya|vai|Etat|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|yat|pa~jcamam|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -vAntaM̍ gatvA &pathAt̍ panthAmapi# yantyathO yathA vahIyasA̍ pratisAraM ~Mvahanti̍ tAdRugEva tacCandAṅsyanyO̱&nyasya̍# lOkamaByaddhyAyan̍ tAnyEtEnaiva dEvA vyavAhayannaindravAyavasya̍ vA EtadAyatanaM̍ ~Myaccaturthamahastasmi̍-nnAgrayaṇO̍ gRuhyatE̍ tasmAdAgrayaṇasyA̍ &&*yatanE̍ navamE&hannaindravAyavO̍ gRuhyatE̍ śukrasya vA EtadAyatanaM̍ ~Myat pa~jcama̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam ahaḥ|tasminn̍|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|aindravAyavasyEtyai̱ndra - vAyavasya|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱-yatanE|saptamE|ahann̍|śukraḥ|gRuhyatE|Agrayaṇasya̍|vai|Etat|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|yat|ṣaṣṭham|aha̍ḥ|tasminn̍|śukraḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|śukrasya̍|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|aṣṭamE|ahann̍|Agrayaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|tat|vIti̍|vAhayati|prEti̍|vasya̍saḥ|vivAhamiti̍# vi-vAham|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|athO̍ iti|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eva|yajñE|saM~Mvidamiti̍# saM - vida̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|idam|anyaḥ|anyasmai̱ ( )|dadAti||33 (51)
verses.samhita: -mahastasminnaindravAyavO̍ gRuhyatE̍ tasmAdaindravAyavasyA&&*yata̍nE̍ saptamE&ha~jCukrO̍ gRuhyata̍ Agrayaṇasya vA EtadAyatanaM̍ ~Myath ṣaṣṭhamahastasmi~jCukrO̍ gRuhyatE̍ tasmA̱cCukrasyA &&*yatanE&ṣṭamE&ha̍nnAgrayaṇO̍ gRuhyatE̍ CandAṅsyEva̍ tadvi vAhayati̍ pra vasyasO̍ vivAhamA̱pnOti ya EvaM ~MvEdAthO# dEvatA̱Bya Eva yajñE saM~MvidaM̍ dadhAti tasmAdida-manyO̱&nyasmai̍# ( ) dadAti||33

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|prEti|jAyEya|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|dvAdaśarAtramiti̍# dvAdaśa - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|prEti̍|ajAyata|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|prEti̍|jAyEya|iti̍|saḥ|dvAdaśarAtrEṇEti̍# dvAdaśa - rAtrEṇa|yajEta|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|agniṣṭOmaprA̍yaṇA̍ ityagniṣṭOma̍ - prAyaṇAḥ|yajñAḥ|atha|kasmA̱t|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|pUrvaḥ|prEti̍|yujyatE|iti̍|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|kanInikE̍ iti|agniṣṭOmAvitya̍gni-̍ stOmau|yat|34 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirakAmayata̍ pra jAyEyEti̍ sa EtaM dvAdaśarAtrama̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa prAjAyata̍ yaḥ kAmayEta̍ pra jAyEyEti̍ sa dvAdaśarAtrEṇa̍# yajEta praiva jAyatE̍ brahmavAdinO# vadantyagniṣṭOmaprAyaṇA̍ yajñA atha kasmAdatirAtraḥ̍ pUrvaḥ pra yujyata̍ iti cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yadatirAtrau̍ kanInikE̍ agniṣṭOmau ya - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam agniṣṭOmamityagni-stOmam|pUrva̱m|prayu~jjIranniti̍# pra-yu~jjIrann|bahid^^rdhEti# bahiḥ - dhA|kanInikE̍ iti|daddhyuḥ|tasmA̱t|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|pUrvaḥ|prEti̍|yujyatE|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|Eva|yajñE|dhitvA|maddhyataḥ|kanIni̍kE̍ iti|pratIti̍|dadhati|yaḥ|vai|gAyatrIm|jyOti̍ḥpakṣAmiti̍ jyOtiḥ̍ - pakṣAm|vEda|jyOti̍ṣA|BAsA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|yau|agniṣṭOmAvityagni̍ - stOmau|tau|pakṣau|yE|antarE|aṣṭau|ukthyA̱ḥ|saḥ|AtmA|EṣA|vai|gAyatrI|jyOti̍ḥpakṣEti̍ jyOtiḥ̍ - pakṣA|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|jyOti̍ṣA|BAsA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|35 (50)
verses.samhita: -dagniṣṭOmaM̍ pUrvaM̍ prayu~jjIran bahirddhA̍ kanInikE̍ daddhyustasmAdatirAtraḥ̍ pUrvaḥ pra yujyatE̍ cakṣuṣI̍ Eva yajñE dhitvA maddhyataḥ̍ kanInikE̍ prati# dadhati yO vai gAyatrIM̍ jyOtiḥpakṣAM̍ ~MvEda jyOtiṣA̍ BAsA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ yAvagniṣṭOmau̍ tau pakṣau yE&ntarE&ṣṭAvukthyA̱ḥ̍ sa AtmaiṣA vai gAyatrI̍ jyOtiḥpakṣA̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda jyOtiṣA̍ BAsA suvargaM̍ ~MlOka - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|dvAdaśadhEti# dvAdaśa - dhA|vihita̍ iti vi - hitaḥ|yat|dvAdaśarAtra iti# dvAdaśa - rAtraḥ|yau|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|tau|pakṣau|yE|antarE|aṣṭau|ukthyA̱ḥ|saḥ|AtmA|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vAva|Eṣaḥ|sann|sat|ha|vai|satrEṇa|spRuṇOti|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|sat|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|spRuṇOti|sarvAsAm|vai|EtE|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|AsatE|yE|satram|AsatE|tasmA̱t|pRucCanti|kim|EtE|satriṇa̍ḥ|iti̍|priyaḥ|prajAnAmiti̍# pra-jAnA̱m ( )|utthita̍ ityut - sthitaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda||36̍ (55)
verses.samhita: -mEti̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa dvAdaśadhA̍ vihitO̍ yad dvAdaśarAtrO̍ yAvatirAtrO̍ tau pakṣau yE&ntarE&ṣṭAvukthyA̱ḥ̍ sa AtmA prajApatirvAvaiṣa̍ santhsaddha vai satrEṇa# spRuṇOti prAṇA vai sat prAṇAnEva spRuṇOti̍ sarvAsAM̍ ~MvA EtE prajAnA̱M prAṇairAsatE̍ yE satramAsatE̍ tasmA̱t pRucCanti kimEtE satriṇa iti# priyaḥ prajAnA ( ) mutthitO̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda||36̍

verses.padam: - Padam na|vai|Eṣaḥ|anyatOvaiśvAnara̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - vaiśvAnaraḥ|suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|lOkAya̍|prEti̍|aBavat|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|ha|vai|Eṣaḥ|Ata̍ta̍ ityA - tataḥ|AsIt|tE|dEvAḥ|Etam|vaiśvAnaram|parIti|auhann|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|praBU̱tyA̍ iti pra-BUtyai|Rutavaḥ|vai|EtEna̍|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|ayAjayann|tEṣu|Ad^^rdhnOt|adhIti̍|tat|RuddhnOti̍|ha|vai|Rutvikṣu̍|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|dvAdaśAhEnEti̍# dvAdaśa - ahEna|yaja̍tE|tE|asminn|aicCanta|saḥ|rasa̱m|aha̍|vasantAya̍|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: na vA EṣO̱&nyatOvaiśvAnaraḥ̍ suvargAya# lOkAya prABavadUrddhvO̍ ha vA Eṣa Atata̍ AsIt tE dEvA EtaM ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM paryauhanth̍ suvargasya# lOkasya praBU̱tyA RutavO vA EtEna# prajApatimayAjayan̍ tEṣvA̱rddhnOdadhi tadRuddhnOti# ha vA Rutvikṣu ya EvaM ~MvidvAn dvAdaśAhEna̍ yajatE̍ tE̱&sminnaicCanta sa rasamaha# vasantAya prAyacCa̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam yava̱m|grIṣmAya|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|varq.ṣABya̍ḥ|vrIhIn|śaradE̱|mAṣatilAviti̍# mAṣa - tilau|hEmantaśiśirAByAmiti# hEmanta - śiśirAByA̱m|tEna|indra̱m|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|ayAjayat|tataḥ|vai|indra̍ḥ|indra̍ḥ|aBavat|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|AnujAvarasyEtyA̍nu̍ - jAvarasya|yajñaḥ|iti̍|saḥ|hi|EtEna̍|agrE̱|aya̍jata|Eṣaḥ|ha|vai|kuṇapa̱m|atti|yaḥ|satrE|pratigRuhṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuhṇAti|puruṣakuṇapamiti̍# puruṣa - kuṇapam|aśvakuṇapamityaśva̍ - kuṇapam|gauḥ|vai|anna̱m|yEna|pAtrE̍ṇa|anna̱m|biBra̍ti|yat|tat|na|nirṇEni̍jatIti̍# niḥ - nEnijati|tata̍ḥ|adhIti̍|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dyavaM̍ grIṣmAyauṣadhIrvarq.ṣAByO̱̍ vrIhI~jCaradE# mAṣatilau hEmantaśiśirAByAM̍ tEnEndraM̍ prajApatirayAjayat̍ tatO vA indra indrO&Bavat̍ tasmAdAhurAnujAvarasya̍# yajña iti sa hyEtEnA&grE&ya̍jataiṣa̍ ha vai kuṇapamatti̍ yaḥ satrE pratigRuhṇAti̍# puruṣakuṇapamaśvakuṇapaM̍ gaurvA annaM ~MyEna pAtrEṇAnnaM biBrati̍ yat tanna nirṇEnijati̍ tatO&dhi - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam mala̱m|jAyatE|Ekaḥ|Eva|yajEta|Eka̍ḥ|hi|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Ad^^rdhnO̱t|dvAdaśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vAva|Eṣaḥ|Eṣaḥ|ha|tu|vai|jAyatE|yaḥ|tapasaḥ|adhIti̍|jAya̍tE|catud^^rdhEti̍# catuḥ - dhA|vai|EtAḥ|tisrastisra̍ iti# tisraḥ-tisraḥ|rAtrayaḥ|yat|dvAda̍śa|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|yAḥ|prathamAḥ|yajñam|tABi̍ḥ|samiti̍|Barati|yAḥ|dvitIyA̱ḥ|yajñam|tABi̍ḥ|Eti̍|raBatE|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: malaM̍ jAyata Eka# Eva yajEtaikO̍ hi prajApatirArddhnOd̍ dvAdaśa̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatirvAvaiṣa̍ Eṣa ha tvai jAyatE̍ yastapasO&dhi jAyatE̍ caturddhA vA EtAstisrastisrO̍ rAtrayO̍ yad dvAdaśOpasadO̍ yAḥ prathamA̍ yajñaM tABiḥ saM Barati̍ yA dvitIyA# yajñaM tABirA raBatE̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam yAḥ|tRutIyA̱ḥ|pAtrAṇi|tABi̍ḥ|niriti̍|nEniktE|yAḥ|caturthIḥ|apIti̍|tABi̍ḥ|AtmAna̱m|antarataḥ|śundhatE|yaḥ|vai|asya|paśum|atti̍|mAṃqsam|saḥ|atti|yaḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|mastiṣka̱m|saḥ|yaḥ|parivApamiti̍# pari - vApam|purIṣam|saḥ|yaḥ|Ajya̱m|majjAna̱m|saḥ|yaḥ|sOma̱m|svEda̱m|saḥ|apIti̍|ha|vai|asya|śIṛqṣaṇyA̱ḥ|niṣpada̍ iti# niḥ - padaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|dvAdaśAha̍ iti# dvAdaśa-ahE|pratigRuhṇAtIti# prati - gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|dvAdaśAhEnEti̍# dvAdaśa - ahEna# ( )|na|yAjya̱m|pApmanaḥ|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai||40̍ (54)
verses.samhita: yAstRutIyAḥ pAtrAṇi̍ tABirnirṇEniktE̍ yAścaturthIrapi̍ tABirAtmAna̍mantarataḥ̍ śundhatE̍ yO vA asya̍ paśumatti# mAṃqsaṃ sO̱&tti yaḥ purOḍAśa̍M̍ mastiṣkaṃq sa yaḥ parivApaM̍ purIṣaṃq̍ sa ya AjyaM̍ majjAnaṃq sa yaḥ sOmaṅq svEdaṃq sO&pi# ha vA asya̍ śIṛṣaṇyA# niṣpadaḥ prati# gRuhṇAti yO dvAdaśAhE̍ pratigRuhṇAti̍ tasmA̱d dvAdaśAhEna ( ) na yAjyaM̍ pApmanO vyAvRuttyai||40̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ekasmai|svAhA̱|dvAByA̱m|svAhA̱|triBya̍ iti# tri - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|caturBya iti# catuḥ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcaBya iti# pa~jca - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|ṣaḍBya iti# ṣaṭ- Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptaBya iti# sapta - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|aṣṭAByaḥ|svAhA̱|navaBya iti# nava - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|daśaBya iti# daśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkAdaśaBya ityEkAdaśa̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|dvAdaśaBya iti# dvAdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|trayOdaśaBya iti# trayOdaśa-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|caturdaśaBya iti# caturdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcadaśaBya iti# pa~jcadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|ṣOḍaśaBya iti# ṣOḍaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptadaśaBya iti# saptadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|aṣṭAdaśaBya ityaṣṭAdaśa̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|navaviṃśatyA̍ iti nava# - viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|catvAriṃqśatE̱|svAhA̱|navacatvAriṃśata̍ iti nava# - catvAriṃqśatE|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na ( )|ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|navaṣaṣṭyA̍ iti nava# - ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|aśItyai|svAhA̱|navAśItyA̍ iti nava# - aśItyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|śatAya|svAhA̱|śatAya̍|svAhA̱|dvAByA̱m|śatAByA̱m|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||41̍ (71) (navacatvAriṃśatE̍ svAhai-kAnnaikaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: Ekasmai̍ svAhA dvAByAṅq svAhA̱ triByaḥ svAhA# caturByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcaByaḥ svAhA# ṣaḍByaḥ svAhA# saptaByaḥ svAhA̱ &ṣṭAByaḥ svAhA# navaByaḥ svAhA# daśaByaḥ svAhai# -kAdaśaByaḥ svAhA̱ dvAdaśaByaḥ svAhA̱ trayOdaśaByaḥ svAhA# caturdaśaByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcadaśaByaḥ svAhA# ṣOḍaśaByaḥ svAhA# saptadaśaByaḥ svAhA̱ &ṣṭAdaśaByaḥ svAhai-kAnna viṃśatyai̍ svAhA navaviṃśatyai̍ svAhai-kAnna catvAriṃqśatE̍ svAhA navacatvAriṃśatE̍ svAhai-kAnna ( ) ṣaṣṭyai svAhA navaṣaṣṭyai̍ svAhai -kAnnAśItyai svAhA navAśItyai̍ svAhaikAnna śatAya svAhA# śatAya svAhA dvAByAṃ# śatAByAṅq svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||41 (navacatvAriṃśatE̍ svAhai-kAnnaikaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ekasmai|svAhA̱|triBya̍ iti# tri - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcaBya iti# pa~jca - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptaBya iti# sapta - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|navaBya iti# nava - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkAdaśaBya ityEkAdaśa-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|trayOdaśaBya̍ iti# trayOdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcadaśaBya iti# pa~jcadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptadaśaBya iti# saptadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|navaviṃśatyA̍ iti nava# - viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|catvAriṃqśatE̱|svAhA̱|navacatvAriṃśata̍ iti nava-catvAriṃqśatE|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|nava̍ṣaṣṭyA̍ iti nava-ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|aśItyai|svAhA̱|navA̍śItyA̍ iti nava# - aśItyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|śatAya|svAhA̱|śatAya̍|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Ekasmai̍ svAhA̱ triByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcaByaḥ svAhA# saptaByaḥ svAhA# navaByaḥ svAhai-̍ kAdaśaByaḥ svAhA̱ trayOdaśaByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcadaśaByaḥ svAhA# saptadaśaByaḥ svAhaikAnna viṃśatyai̍ svAhA navaviṃśatyai̍ svAhaikAnna catvAriṃqśatE̍ svAhA navacatvAriṃśatE̍ svAhaikAnna ṣaṣṭyai svAhA navaṣaṣṭyai̍ svAhaikAnnA śItyai svAhA navAśItyai̍ svAhaikAnna śatAya svAhA# śatAya svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||42

verses.padam: - Padam dvAByA̱m|svAhA̱|caturBya iti# catuḥ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|ṣaḍBya iti# ṣaṭ- Byaḥ|svAhA̱|aṣṭAByaḥ|svAhA̱|daśaBya iti# daśa-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|dvAdaśaBya iti# dvAdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|caturdaśaBya iti# caturdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|ṣOḍaśaBya iti# ṣOḍaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|aṣṭAdaśaBya ityaṣṭAdaśa̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|aṣṭAnavatyA̍ ityaṣṭA - navatyai|svAhA̱|śatAya|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||43̍ (26) (dvAByAmaṣṭAna̍vatyai̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: dvAByAṅq svAhA# caturByaḥ svAhA# ṣaḍByaḥ svAhA̱ &ṣṭAByaḥ svAhA# daśaByaḥ svAhA̱ dvAdaśaByaḥ svAhA# caturdaśaByaḥ svAhA# ṣOḍaśaByaḥ svAhA̱ &ṣṭAdaśaByaḥ svAhA# viṃśatyai svAhA &ṣṭAnavatyai̍ svAhA# śatAya svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||43 (dvAByAmaṣṭAna̍vatyai̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam triBya iti# tri - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcaBya iti# pa~jca - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptaBya iti# sapta-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|navaBya iti# nava-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkAdaśaBya ityEkAdaśa̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|trayOdaśaBya iti# trayOdaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pa~jcadaśaBya iti# pa~jcadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|saptadaśaBya iti# saptadaśa - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|navaviṃśatyA̍ iti nava# - viṃqśatyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|catvAriṃqśatE̱|svAhA̱|navacatvAriṃśata̍ iti nava# - catvAriṃqśatE|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|navaṣaṣṭyA̍ iti nava# - ṣaṣṭyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|aśItyai|svAhA̱|navAśItyA̍ iti nava# - aśItyai|svAhA̱|EkA̱t|na|śatAya|svAhA̱|śatAya̍|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||44̍ (48) (triByO̱ - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃqśat) (A14)
verses.samhita: triByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcaByaḥ svAhA# saptaByaḥ svAhA# navaByaḥ svAhai-kAdaśaByaḥ̍ svAhA̱ trayOdaśaByaḥ svAhA# pa~jcadaśaByaḥ svAhA# saptadaśaByaḥ svAhaikAnna viṃśatyai̍ svAhA navaviṃśatyai̍ svAhaikAnna catvAriṃqśatE̍ svAhA navacatvAriṃśatE̍ svAhaikAnna ṣaṣṭyai svAhA navaṣaṣṭyai̍ svAhaikAnnA &śItyai svAhA navAśItyai̍ svAhaikAnna śatAya svAhA# śatAya svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||44
